reviewText: It was for zone 2.  I have a player that will play all zones.  It was delightful.  I have no idea where my children put our VHS version.
Will not play in DVD player. Waste of my money.
I received a dvd that was not in my region. I cant play it and have not received a refund.

So sad and bummed I ordered this movie for my sons birthday day. We ordered one other movie Gnomeo & Juliet and it was awesome another favorite movie of his it worked fine. This movie was bad or damaged as it didn't work in either of our dvd players and it broke my sons heart :(
